description:
In a special bonus episode of Everything Iconic, Danny welcomes author of Not All Diamonds & RosÃ©, the new Housewives oral history book, Dave Quinn, to talk about writing the tell-all, secrets he learned along the way, juicy tidbits that had to be cut, hopes for a Real Housewives of Dubai, and more!


PREORDER DANNY'S NEW BOOK HERE: http://smarturl.it/unremember


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
